Package org.fao.oekc.autotagger.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgrovocMappingParser
    This class is responsible to parse the mapping agrovoc_english -> URI
    DirectoryManager
    Manage the creation of a directory
    DirectoryZipper
    This object is responsible of zipping files or directories
    HTMLConverter
    HTML Converter
    PDFConverter
    PDF converter
    TxtNewLineReader
    Parse a text file whose lines have been grouped by new line and each group ends with a "@" line.
    TXTWriter
    Write a txt file
    XLSWriter
    Creates Excel spreadsheet for the filtered journals
